testcase.classname: US_008 Password segment on Homepage should be editable
testcase.name: old password should not be accepted
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the registration page......................................passed Given user navigates to lending page "https://medunna.com"..................passed And user navigates to sign in portal........................................passed And user clicks on sign in button...........................................passed When user provides the username as "admin"..................................passed And user provides the password as "Admin@123"...............................passed Then user clicks on login button............................................passed Then user navigates to password.............................................passed And User enters current password as "Admin@123".............................passed And User enters New password as the same "Admin@123"........................passed And User enters New password confirmation as the same "Admin@123"...........passed And User clicks on Save button..............................................passed Then verify the error message is displayed..................................passed
